ap_code__c.label: AP Code
ap_code__c.inlineHelpText: Action Program from which this item is funded.

is_test_data__c.label: Is Test Data
is_test_data__c.inlineHelpText: Field represent for Test Data if Checked. If checked, records will not reflect on Reports and Workflows

phase__c.label: Phase #
phase__c.inlineHelpText:
Phase 1: ID & Proposal
Phase 2: Setup
Phase 3: Planning
Phase 4:  Implementation
Phase 5: Monitoring & Evaluation
Phase 6: Transition

external_title__c.label: External Title
external_title__c.inlineHelpText: This indicates what the project is referenced as outside of ARC-ISD

project_lead_field__c.label: Program/Project Lead Field
project_lead_field__c.inlineHelpText: It represents "Project Lead Field" if you are adding it on a Project & it refers to "Program Lead Field" if you are adding it on a Program.

project_lead_hq__c.label: Lead HQ/Response Lead
project_lead_hq__c.inlineHelpText: It represents "Project Lead NHQ" if you are adding it on a Project & it refers to "Program Lead NHQ" if you are adding it on a Program.

sector__c.label: Sector
sector__c.inlineHelpText: It contains Sectors rolled up from all related Projects for a Program.

sub_sector__c.label: Sub-Sector
sub_sector__c.inlineHelpText: It contains Sectors rolled up from all related Projects for a Program.

consolidated_record_type__c.label: Consolidated Record Type
consolidated_record_type__c.inlineHelpText: This field is used in report in order to consolidated the 2 record types "Long Term" and "Long Term Approved" into a single category called "Long Term".

ap_codes__c.label: AP Codes
ap_codes__c.inlineHelpText: It contains all AP Codes of the respective Program as well as those rolled up from related Projects on a Program.

locations__c.label: Project Locations
locations__c.inlineHelpText: It contains all Locations rolled up from the related Projects.

target_beneficiaries_rollup_type__c.label: Target Beneficiaries Rollup Type
target_beneficiaries_rollup_type__c.inlineHelpText: Select “sum” if all projects within the program are reaching beneficiaries in different locations. Select “max” if there is overlap between beneficiaries in more than one project.

project_evaluation__c.label: Program/Project Performance Status
project_evaluation__c.inlineHelpText: This field contains link to latest Performance Status record. Hovering over the link will display details of the Performance Status record.

data_migration_status__c.label: Data migration Status
data_migration_status__c.inlineHelpText:
This field provides information to users on the progress of the migration of their projects to ECOS. 
For additional questions, contact Nick Reese.

picklistValues.label: Core Documentation Received – Further Guidance Needed
picklistValues.value: Core Documentation Received – Further Guidance Needed

data_migration_status_notes__c.label: Data migration Status Notes
data_migration_status_notes__c.inlineHelpText:
These are notes for the project/program staff from the Data migration unit. 
For additional questions, contact Nick Reese.

is_test_data__c.label: Is Test Data
is_test_data__c.inlineHelpText: Field represent for Test Data if Checked. If checked, records will not reflect on Reports and Workflows

total_arc_contributions__c.label: Total ARC Contributions
total_arc_contributions__c.inlineHelpText: This field represents total ARC contributions provided for this disaster.

future_contribution__c.label: Future Contribution
future_contribution__c.inlineHelpText: This field suggests if ARC is going to do any further contribution for this request.

requested_amount_foreign_currerncy__c.label: Requested Amount (Foreign Currency)
requested_amount_foreign_currerncy__c.inlineHelpText: Requested amount in Foreign Currency should be entered in this field. You should fill Exchange Rate if you are entering this amount so as to convert it into USD.

requested_amount_usd__c.label: Requested Amount (USD)
requested_amount_usd__c.inlineHelpText: Enter Amount from Request in USD in this field.

requested_amount__c.label: Requested Amount
requested_amount__c.inlineHelpText:
1. Note that if you have entered Requested Amount Foreign Currency then, this field displays corresponding Requested Amount calculated in USD. 
2. This field displays Requested Amount (USD) if you have entered Requested Amount in USD.

response_strategy_comments__c.label: Response Strategy/Comments
response_strategy_comments__c.inlineHelpText: Response Strategy or comments for the request.

total_arc_cash_contribution_on_rfa__c.label: Total ARC Cash Contribution on RFA

location__r_isd_region__c.label: ISD Region
location__r_isd_region__c.inlineHelpText: Region of the location according to ISD

period_actual_sum__c.label: Period Acutal Sum
period_actual_sum__c.inlineHelpText: This will store the Actual Sum Value of Aggregate

period_actuals_max__c.label: Period Acutal Max
period_actuals_max__c.inlineHelpText: This will store the Actual Max Value of Aggregate

period_target_max__c.label: Period Target Max
period_target_max__c.inlineHelpText: This will store the Target Max Value of Aggregate

period_target_sum__c.label: Period Target Sum
period_target_sum__c.inlineHelpText: This will store the Target Sum Value of Aggregate

category__c.label: Strategy
category__c.inlineHelpText: Please review the guidance for an explanation of these.

description__c.label: Risk Description
description__c.inlineHelpText: Enter a concise description of the risk.

impact__c.label: Impact
impact__c.inlineHelpText:
1 = Low Impact, 5 = High Impact 
Using a scale of 1 through 5, select the potential impact of the risk should it occur PRIOR TO ANY MITIGATING ACTION. See the Assessment Definitions below for more guidance.

likelihood__c.label: Likelihood
likelihood__c.inlineHelpText:
1= Not likely, 5=Very Likely 
Using a scale of 1 through 5, select the degree to which the risk is likely to happen PRIOR TO ANY MITIGATING ACTION. See the Assessment Definitions below for more guidance.

mitigation__c.label: Mitigation explanation
mitigation__c.inlineHelpText: Enter a brief explanation of the selected strategy.

risk_type__c.label: Risk Type
risk_type__c.inlineHelpText: Select the type of risk that the entry represents. Select as many types as are relevant using the definitions for risk type provided below. Many risks are inter-related and may be a result of each other (e.g. a security risk that limits access to an area

picklistValues.label: Continue to report but does not require further discussion
picklistValues.value: Continue to report but does not require further discussion

picklistValues.label: Continue monitoring but remove from LT report
picklistValues.value: Continue monitoring but remove from LT report

notes_from_functional_leads__c.label: Notes from Functional Leads
notes_from_functional_leads__c.inlineHelpText: Functional Leads should use this field to add comments about the risk during their review.

severity__c.label: Severity
severity__c.inlineHelpText: Is the value of Likelihood * Impact and gives you the overall assessment

overall_assessment__c.label: Overall Assessment
overall_assessment__c.inlineHelpText:
This provides you a way to assess the overall risk you have logged. Choose one of the options.
Based on the matrix in the guidance document and the rating you selected for likelihood and impact, designate an overall assessment of the risk.

risk_owner__c.label: Risk Owner
risk_owner__c.inlineHelpText: Indicates who owns the risk / person responsible for monitoring the risk and possibly mitigating it.

risk_status__c.label: Risk Status
risk_status__c.inlineHelpText:
Known-the existence of the risk is known to the project team. “Known” is the default status of risks when they are added to ProjectFuture.
Analyzed: an analysis (or more) has been done to understand the nature of the risk (characteristics, causes, effect

budget_status__c.label: Budget Status
budget_status__c.inlineHelpText: The relationship between budget and actual expenditure. Actual is defined as invoices paid.

human_resource_status__c.label: Human Resource Status
human_resource_status__c.inlineHelpText: Key project team members and/or functions are defined and available.

scope_status__c.label: Scope Status
scope_status__c.inlineHelpText: The status of key performance indicators (KPIs). This is subjective and criteria for scope must be identified at project start.

stakeholder_status__c.label: Stakeholder Status
stakeholder_status__c.inlineHelpText: Stakeholders as identified in the project charter or contract agreements as critical to the project’s success. Use of RACI will help identify stakeholders.

timeline_status__c.label: Timeline Status
timeline_status__c.inlineHelpText: The relationship between the planned and actual project dates within the given timeframe. Dates within timeframe may be the key milestones or critical path dates. Projects must establish an initial timeline at the project start.
